name: Project Opal
description:
This game is currently in development. I have been joined by a few like minded individuals and we are excited to share what we have come up with.  I've uploaded an early prototype of the game that I created but I am also posting images and gifs from the newer features and aesthetic below. 

It's a marriage between tower defense and the tactics rpg genre. It has a good deal more systems in place and if all goes well, will be my biggest release to date. I will update this page to keep fans in the loop. Take a look at the teasers below, will they make it into the final game? Time will tell !

We also have some new characters coming, take a look at the concepts below! 

Knight Rogue
Monk

Thanks for taking a look at what my team has been up to. Check back in a few months and see where we have taken this exciting project!
